segments.text: Now I'm sure we'll never get all our things back . They're so clever these criminals . What's the point of collecting beautiful things for other people to steal ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I only wish it were this time yesterday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Think how happy we were . Now this.Things always go wrong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps we ought to get dressed and have breakfast . We'd feel better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't feel like breakfast . I don't feel like anything . Why are we so unlucky ? It's as if there were a jinx on us .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Perhaps I'd better ring the police ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . Of course . But what good will it do ? That man's miles away from here by now . In our car .
segments.speaker: S1
